s-1.ptxt: REMOVE WINDSHIELD WASHER MOTOR AND PUMP ASSEMBLY

s2.ptxt: Disconnect the windshield washer motor and pump connector.

atten4.ptxt: Make sure that the windshield washer motor and pump is installed to the washer jar.

s2.ptxt: Fill the washer jar with washer fluid.
Connect the positive (+) lead of the battery to terminal 1 of the windshield washer motor and pump, and the negative (-) lead to terminal 2.
Check that washer fluid flows from the washer jar.

specitem.ptxt: Washer fluid flows from the washer jar.
If the result is not as specified, replace the washer motor and pump assembly.

s2.ptxt: Disconnect the rear washer motor and pump connector.

atten4.ptxt: Make sure that the rear washer motor and pump is installed to the washer jar.

s2.ptxt: Fill the washer jar with washer fluid.
Connect the battery's positive (+) lead to terminal 1 of the rear washer motor and pump, and the negative (-) lead to terminal 2.
Check that washer fluid flows from the washer jar.

specitem.ptxt: Washer fluid flows from washer jar.
If the result is not as specified, replace the rear washer motor and pump assembly.
